title: Mary Earps - Wikipedia
snippet: She and Paris Saint-Germain lost 5–2 on aggregate to Juventus in the 2024–25 UEFA Women's Champions League qualifying rounds. On 12 November 2025, Earps returned to Manchester United in the Champions League for the first time since her move, where they lost 2-1.

title: Mary Earps’ Manchester United return: Jeers, cheers, selfies and a painful defeat - The Athletic

title: Local Legends: Mary Earps MBE - From Nottingham To National Icon - Impact Magazine
snippet: At the end of the 2023/24 season, Earps left Manchester United and English football behind in order to pursue a new challenge and sign for French side PSG, where she established herself as the No.

title: England goalkeeper Mary Earps retires ahead of 2025 Euros in shock announcement
snippet: Although she is retiring from international football, Mary Earps will still play club football, after joining Paris Saint-Germain from Manchester United last year. The UEFA Women’s Euro 2025 tournament will be played in Switzerland from 2 ...
